publications.contents: @inproceedings{DBLP:conf/soda/HuangHKP17, author = {Shang{-}En Huang and Dawei Huang and Tsvi Kopelowitz and Seth Pettie}, title = {Fully Dynamic Connectivity in $O(\log n(\log\log n)^2)$ Amortized Expected Time}, booktitle = {SODA 2017}, pages = {510--520}, year = {2017}, url = {https://doi.org/10.1137/1.9781611974782.32}, doi = {10.1137/1.9781611974782.32}, timestamp = {Wed, 24 May 2017 08:31:21 +0200}, biburl = {https://dblp.org/rec/bib/conf/soda/HuangHKP17}, bibsource = {dblp computer science bibliography, https://dblp.org}, } @inproceedings{DBLP:conf/swat/HuangP18, author = {Shang{-}En Huang and Seth Pettie}, title = {Lower Bounds on Sparse Spanners, Emulators, and Diameter-reducing shortcuts}, booktitle = {SWAT 2018}, pages = {26:1--26:12}, year = {2018}, url = {https://doi.org/10.4230/LIPIcs.SWAT.2018.26}, doi = {10.4230/LIPIcs.SWAT.2018.26}, timestamp = {Thu, 23 Aug 2018 15:56:07 +0200}, biburl = {https://dblp.org/rec/bib/conf/swat/HuangP18}, bibsource = {dblp computer science bibliography, https://dblp.org} } @article{DBLP:journals/ipl/HuangP19, author = {Shang{-}En Huang and Seth Pettie}, title = {Thorup-Zwick emulators are universally optimal hopsets}, journal = {Information Processing Letter, Feburary 2019}, volume = {142}, pages = {9--13}, year = {2019}, url = {https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ipl.2018.10.001}, doi = {10.1016/j.ipl.2018.10.001}, timestamp = {Wed, 26 Dec 2018 19:52:11 +0100}, biburl = {https://dblp.org/rec/bib/journals/ipl/HuangP19}, bibsource = {dblp computer science bibliography, https://dblp.org} }

node.intro:
I am currently a Ph.D student in
[CSE division](https://cse.umich.edu)
at [University of Michigan](https://umich.edu)
advised by [Seth Pettie](http://web.eecs.umich.edu/~pettie/).

**Research Interest**:
Dynamic Graph Data Structures and Algorithms.
Asynchronous Distributed Algorithms.
Algorithms in Word RAM Model.
Lower bound graphs for sparse distance preservers.
